pullRequest.title: Improve quiz exercise creation page
pullRequest.bodyText:
Resolves #2028

Includes several improvements on responsiveness of quiz creation and edit form.
German translation for placeholders added.
Import from file moved under add existing question.
Overall design of the page is now closer to other forms.




The name of the course is completely random.
Test Coverage:

commit.message: Fix responsiveness of elements on quiz creation page and add translation for placeholders
Format quiz-exercise-detail.component.scss
Move file import under add existing question
Fix format issues on quiz exercise scss
Fix edit quiz footer responsiveness
Fix code style issues
Merge branch 'develop' into bugfix/quiz-creation
Add german translations for existing questions options and fix button border issue for difficulty selector

nodes.bodyText:
Instructors can import questions from the same or other courses.
The name is a bit misleading.

commit.message: Make from course default choice and change variable name from another course to course
Add tests for deletion, validation and saving for quiz creation detail
Format quiz detail component test
Merge branch 'develop' into bugfix/quiz-creation

nodes.bodyText: GitHub Actions: 'advanceTo' is defined but never used
GitHub Actions: 'By' is defined but never used
Does it make sense to have a parameter for this and not just always set showExistingQuestionsFromCourse to true considering the other values are not parameterized too?

commit.message: Delete unused imports from quiz creation test
Fix formatting at quiz exercise detail
Fix duplications in quiz exercise detail test
Fix formatting in quiz exercise detail test
Merge branch 'develop' into bugfix/quiz-creation
Add tests for quiz exercise detail component
Fix import questions bug and lint errors
Add tests for quiz exercise detail component
Add tests to quiz exercise detail component
Merge branch 'develop' into bugfix/quiz-creation

nodes.bodyText: Applying your suggestion, shouldnt it then be "Kurzer Fragen Titel" or even "kurzer Fragentitel" (Fragen-Titel)? (It's still Title - should at least be Titel)
